website_summaries.verdict: The LG Tribute 5 on Boost Mobile is an affordable Android smartphone that feels good in hand, but is held back by heavy bloatware, a low-res display, and limited RAM.

customer_reviews.title: Great midrange smartphone...
customer_reviews.text: For $50 this is a pretty nice phone. Only 8 GB means you'll probably need an SD card but that's no big deal. I like it a lot for the price. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: TheStreetDoc

customer_reviews.title: Miss LG Optimus, but LG Tribute 5 Is Ok, Could be Better if It Was New
customer_reviews.text: The phone was purchased new, but is used. Has several permannet stteaaks in the screen. Did not know it had SIM card nr did nt hav SD slot. Phone works, but I expcetd and paid for new phone. Woder how it wud have functone as a new phone? I miss the conveience of keys and buttos on my old phone, which ws misplaced--LG Optimus 7 I don't like idea of a having o go into settings o chnage display lightng and vlume. No outside buttons for that. The button in back is new to me, but acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: DrMaat

customer_reviews.title: buy this phone I received it yesterday and now that ...
customer_reviews.text: buy this phone I received it yesterday and now that I 'm using i put the phone charging the battery the phone overheats so much that I can't not call phone burn my face and leave me with my face red
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Diaz Levy

customer_reviews.title: Was good, may still be if you don't need much
customer_reviews.text: Worked for years. I upgraded simply because it didn't have room for many modern apps, and I wasn't sure how much longer it would last, but I'm still using it along with the new phone. :P
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My Boost Mobile Phone
customer_reviews.text: I got my phone in a timely manner.However it freezes a lot and it gets extremely hot sometimes I have to put it down and leave it for a while and come back later to it when it is cooled.but thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Harrell

customer_reviews.title: This phone is great! Best phone ive ever had!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. I will recommend this pone to everyone. If you are looking for a cheap phone this is the one to buy!! I bought it to use as a work phone and it is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Conor Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Good price. The phone freezes up a lot but ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price. The phone freezes up a lot but takes nice pictures and has a good screen size for games and movies
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good phone. It is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. It is very sturdy. I have dropped my phone more time that i care to remember and it keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.author: James N. Adair

customer_reviews.title: Good little phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my parents and it is such an upgrade from their old chunky phone. The 5 inch screen size is a good size for them and the phone itself is relatively fast. I got it for $50 and for the price paid it is a very nice looking phone and does not look cheap at all, but quite sturdy! If you do lots of heavy browsing or play lots of phone games, I don't think this phone will hold up greatly, but if you are like my parents and just use it for talking, texting, and the occasional Google Maps, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonbona

customer_reviews.title: Bought ph e for a Christmas present. Not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought ph e for a Christmas present. Not sure if I took out insurance on it. Droned it and messed it up on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this phone. For the price you aren't going to go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: lindacrdr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter, who got it today and said she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette C. Overton

customer_reviews.title: great for price
customer_reviews.text: works good bought another for wife, no more out of memory
customer_reviews.author: old man

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my mom
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the phone Monday night and it was literally waiting for me Wednesday day morning. It was the easiest phone I have ever had to set up. I bought it for my mom and she loves it so if you want a nice bigger phone for a cheap price with a unique look this is the phone for you
customer_reviews.author: Lacquan Irby

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone and its very big and I like it
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Collins

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didn't buy it..
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a good price but aftet 3wks I started getting some sydtem functions may not work internal memory low. I thought this was odd so earl, all the apps I download go to my sd card. I clear cache and data sometimes. Which I have never had to do with a phone before. I have called for troubleshooting and it doesn't help. Such a headache I will never buy a phone off amazon again. My worse experience yet
customer_reviews.author: LaShawnrdra West

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the most unreliable phone I've had it gets extremely hot when I charge it while it's on and dies as it charge I have to turn it off before I start charging it
customer_reviews.author: Austin  Culver

customer_reviews.title: A piece of @#
customer_reviews.text: Crappy phone. Tried for a month ti get it usable. Want to throw it in the river or run it over with my vehicle!!! Ugh. Can't "root" it. Can't download apps!!! Can't switch to SD card for external storage. Overall, a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Joelle Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Sucked
customer_reviews.text: Received it today but I only got the box. The phone was missing.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the way the screan curves on the sides
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the way the screan curves on the sides. Tempered glass and even regular screan protectors will not lay flat so of you do not mind using a phone with out any kind of screan protection on it. I also did not like the fact the home screan only had two places. My LG stylo has five and I did not like only having two. My daughter and son like theirs and are happy. I did not and re-activated my old phone right away. To each their own. So out of the three I bought I was the only one who did not like the lay out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these from boost at the end of april. It's a great phone. Nice big screen and the apps are great. Great pictures and features. Just got one for my husband. Amazing phone for the price. Nice and slim. I usually don't like the bigger phones but this one fita pretty comfortably in your hand and the edges are very smooth flow with the rest of the phone so it feels very nice. Can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: B Stout

customer_reviews.title: Best phone
customer_reviews.text: The best phone for the price I use this phone everyday and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: tyreis

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I received the phone with package in tact. Everything is working good. Phone freezes at times. Otherwise,i really like the way it works. I have even bought the phone for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: QP

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is very good quality for the low price and has a bigger screen for a cheap phone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cook

customer_reviews.title: DECENT LOW BUDGET PHONE
customer_reviews.text: GETTING USE TO LG PHONES, A BIT DIFFERENT THAN SAMSUNG. COMING FROM HTC WHICH IF YOU WERE AN HTC USER, YOU KNOW HAS SOME PRETTY COOL USER INTERFACES, SPECIFICALLY BLINK FEED. ONLY THING I DONT LIKE ABOUT LG IS THAT THERE IS NO MIRACAST....I GOT USED TO USING THIS REGULAR WITH HTC, AND NOW, HAVE TO TRY ALT APPS.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but has issues
customer_reviews.text: Shuts down while looking at external links from Facebook? I will be reading a page, then it will close the link. Does not do it all the time but still? I keep thinking that LG would send and update that would fix that issue?
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Graden Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Needs More Space
customer_reviews.text: It is a great phone but just wish it had more space because there never enough space for apps and this is one of those phones where you are unable to transfer the apps from the phone to the SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to Boost Mobile
customer_reviews.text: This phone is one of the best phone Boost Mobile has come out with. It's very nice the camera is very clear, a bit slow but great picture quality. The sound quality is also good. It is definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: IB_fromDC

customer_reviews.title: Warning, APB....You have been warned
customer_reviews.text: Crappy phone with double tap. Bought ph.4my mother4mother"s day. My mom"s is74yts. old&I have a motto g. That perfoms better, problem double tap&it jump to another line. Lot of imperfections I strongly don't recommend returning phone back2day.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Goss

product_meta.title: LG Tribute 5 (M1) - No Contract Phone (Boost Mobile)
product_meta.description: The LG M1 features the latest version of Android Lollipop for a fast and smooth experience. Enjoy a 5” IPS touchscreen display with a 5MP rear and front facing camera perfect for capturing your most important memories. The Qualcomm Snapdragon 210 1.1GHz quad-core processor allows you to switch apps seamlessly too. Experience the LG M1 on boost mobile with competitive plans and sprint’s nationwide enhanced LTE network.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars94 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
